India.etiquette: Use both hands when giving or receiving something.

do_dont.do: Touch feet of elders as a sign of respect.

Japan.etiquette: Bow when greeting, avoid loud conversations in public.

do_dont.do: Remove shoes before entering a home.

Germany.etiquette: Be punctual; time is respected highly.

America.etiquette: Casual and friendly greetings are common.
